area_raw: all squares on the ground that contain plants in an 80-foot burst
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 6" pfs="Standard">
[Nature's Reprisal](/Spells.aspx?ID=954)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
<trait label="Wood" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=508" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Myr](/Deities.aspx?ID=408), [Uskyeria](/Deities.aspx?ID=485), [Verilorn](/Deities.aspx?ID=696)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** all squares on the ground that contain plants in an 80-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

The plant life within the area begins to writhe and lash out against your enemies as you call upon nature to impede your foes. To your enemies, the area becomes difficult terrain, and areas that were naturally difficult terrain due to plants become greater difficult terrain as well as hazardous terrain, dealing 6 poison damage to an enemy each time it enters an affected square.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The poison damage of the hazardous terrain increases by 1.
name: Nature's Reprisal

</row>

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Anger plant life to slow and damage creatures.
</summary>
summary: Anger plant life to slow and damage creatures.

text: Nature's Reprisal Three Actions Source Secrets of Magic pg. 117 2.0 Tradition Primal Deities Myr, Uskyeria, Verilorn Cast material, somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area all squares on the ground that contain plants in an 80-foot burst Duration 1 minute --- The plant life within the area begins to writhe and lash out against your enemies as you call upon nature to impede your foes. To your enemies, the area becomes difficult terrain, and areas that were naturally difficult terrain due to plants become greater difficult terrain as well as hazardous terrain, dealing 6 poison damage to an enemy each time it enters an affected square. --- Heightened (+1) The poison damage of the hazardous terrain increases by 1.
